org.mitre.taxii.messages.xml11

Class MessageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.taxii.messages.xml11.MessageHelper

  • public class MessageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some convenience methods to make constructing TAXII messages easier.

        public static final java.lang.String generateMessageId()
        Generates a random message id.
        Returns:
